# The code was autogenerated from GLAD website.
# I could not get it to work with the build system
# properly, so I decided to drop in the generated 
# files. They were generated in compatibility mode 
# for OpenGL 4.6 and gl API with no extensions.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)
project(GLAD LANGUAGES C)

set(GLAD_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include)

add_library(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}
    src/glad.c
)

target_include_directories(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}
    PRIVATE
    ${GLAD_INCLUDE_DIR}
)
